title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-A ยง 75-A.11 - Specific waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-A ยง 75-A.11 - Specific waivers

State Regulations

Deviations from these standards may be granted by the State Commissioner of Health or the designated full-time city, county or part-county health department official by issuance of a Specific Waiver in accordance with 10 NYCRR Part
75, section
75.6
(b) of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 75-A ยง
75-A.11

Sec. filed: Feb. 20, 1990; March 6, 1990; repealed, new filed Jan. 15, 2010 eff. Feb. 3, 2010. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
